comment.author: Christopher
comment.text: None of Trump's overseas contractual business relationships examined by Newsweek were revealed in his campaign's financial filings with the Federal Election Commission, nor was the amount paid to him by his foreign partners. (The Trump campaign did not respond to a request for the names of all foreign entities in partnership or contractually tied to the Trump Organization.) Trump's financial filings also indicate he is a shareholder or beneficiary of several overseas entities, including Excel Venture LLC in the French West Indies and Caribusiness Investments SRL, based in the Dominican Republic, one of the world's tax havens.

replies.author: Lindsey
replies.text: Trump's tax returns would likely show his connections to and dependence on Russian capital aligned with Putin. Show us your Tax returns Trump. What are you hiding?

replies.author: Christopher
replies.text: Trump is Putin's puppet and most likely a traitor indebted to a foreign power

replies.author: Christopher
replies.text: Trump's refusal to provide documentation on his wife's immigration status was part of a pattern for Trump, who has also declined to release his tax records, charitable giving details and other personal information. "These are the people who harassed the president for this birth certificate,"

replies.author: Lindsey
replies.text: Donald J Trump said, "And if I decide to run for office, I'll produce my tax returns, absolutely and I would love to do that. " Donald J Trump, show us your tax returns like you promised! What are you hiding? #dopydonald #donthecon #nevertrump #weakdonald
